title: BRAND NEW GUT REHAB! 3 bedroom & 2 bath unit
posting_body: ['We have two other units with 1& 3 bedrooms available in this building.', 'See pricing below:', 'Unit 2: $2,995 - 3D tour coming soon - 1 BED', 'Unit 3: $5,050 - 3D tour coming soon - 3 BED', 'BRAND NEW GUT REHAB!', '3 bedroom,2 bath unit on two floors (first and basement).', 'The unit is completely renovated and features Bosch appliances, in-unit laundry, and more.', "Located in Packard's Corner right by the green line station (B Line) in Allston.", 'Off-street parking is available for rent.', 'Driveway fits 3 cars for an additional $700/month.', 'Cat friendly for $75/month.', 'Dogs are considered on a case-by-case basis for an additional $150/month.', 'Easy access to the train station, bus lines, restaurants, stores, and shops.', 'Security deposit negotiable.', 'SUMBETERED:', 'Tenants responsible for water and sewer payments.', '3D tour coming soon.', 'AVAILABLE 9/1/22']
